mapper.insert: insert into board(board_no, board_title, users_no, board_content, board_views, board_date, board_fname, board_fsize, board_show) values(seq_board.nextval,#{board_title},#{users_no},#{board_content}, 0, sysdate, #{board_fname},#{board_fsize}, 0)
mapper.select: select board_no, board_title, users_nickname, board_content, board_date, board_views, board_fname, board_fsize from board, users where board_no=#{board_no} and board.users_no = users.users_no
mapper.update: update board set board_views=board_views + 1 where board_no=#{board_no}
update board set b_step = b_step +1 where b_ref=#{b_ref} and b_step > #{b_step}
UPDATE board SET board_show = 1 WHERE board_no = #{board_no}
